story.title: Chicago Teachers Solidarity Town Hall

author.name: Josh Kalov
author.bio: Fan of education, politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

quote.text: Packed temple for the Town Hall, plenty of press too. Meeting about to start. People chanting, lots of energy. #CTU

quote.text: Dennis Kosuth: "The people in the Board of Ed don't send their kids to public schools, they don't live in our neighborhoods." #CTU

meta.text: Dennis Kosuth: "The people in the Board of Ed don't send their kids to public schools, they don't live in our neighborhoods." #CTU

user.name: ChiTeacherSolidarity
user.description: Chicago Teachers Solidarity Campaign. We stand in support of the Chicago Teachers Union in their fight for quality public education.

quote.text: "They say there's no money for our schools, but they have money for their hotels. We will not take this sitting down." #CTU

meta.text: "They say there's no money for our schools, but they have money for their hotels. We will not take this sitting down." #CTU

user.description: Chicago Teachers Solidarity Campaign. We stand in support of the Chicago Teachers Union in their fight for quality public education.

user.name: ChiTeacherSolidarity

user.name: ChiTeacherSolidarity
user.description: Chicago Teachers Solidarity Campaign. We stand in support of the Chicago Teachers Union in their fight for quality public education.

quote.text: So far emphasis has been on union vs non-union & corporate takeovers of public school. #cps #ctu

meta.text: So far emphasis has been on union vs non-union & corporate takeovers of public school. #cps #ctu

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of education, politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

quote.text: "CPS wants our children in harms' way. This fight is about the school Chicago's children deserve, but America is watching us." #CTU

meta.text: "CPS wants our children in harms' way. This fight is about the school Chicago's children deserve, but America is watching us." #CTU

user.name: ChiTeacherSolidarity
user.description: Chicago Teachers Solidarity Campaign. We stand in support of the Chicago Teachers Union in their fight for quality public education.

quote.text: Jitu Brown: The fight of #CTU is THE fight to decide if we will stop takeover of public education, saving neighborhoods.

meta.text: Jitu Brown: The fight of #CTU is THE fight to decide if we will stop takeover of public education, saving neighborhoods.

user.name: Katie Osgood
user.description: A special education teacher in Chicago. I think our education system might need an IEP, we don't seem to be learning...

meta.text: "We aren't here to get a job. We are here to fulfill our mission!" #CTU

user.name: Brit Schulte
user.description: I'm a grassroots organizing, burlesque dancing, comic book reading, rockabilly listening, under employed, not taking shit, marxist, death penalty abolitionist.

quote.text: #parents4teachers Erica Clark: I'm not a professional organizer. I was fed up w/ how teachers were treated. #ctu #cts

meta.text: #parents4teachers Erica Clark: I'm not a professional organizer. I was fed up w/ how teachers were treated. #ctu #cts

user.name: xian barrett
user.description: I like ice cream and people. But I don't like the total destruction of our education system or horses. Chi HS teacher. 2009 US DoEd fellow

quote.text: As its name suggests #parents4teachers appears to be much more closely aligned with @ctulocal1 #ctu

meta.text: As its name suggests #parents4teachers appears to be much more closely aligned with @ctulocal1 #ctu

quote.text: Fired teachers from #SOJO going to speak, holding her new baby #ctusolidarity

meta.text: Fired teachers from #SOJO going to speak, holding her new baby #ctusolidarity

quote.text: Katie Hogan, #CTU member, co-founder of SoJo (Social Justice High School).

meta.text: Katie Hogan, #CTU member, co-founder of SoJo (Social Justice High School).

user.name: ChiTeacherSolidarity
user.description: Chicago Teachers Solidarity Campaign. We stand in support of the Chicago Teachers Union in their fight for quality public education.

quote.text: "I am one of the teachers that was dismissed. Apparently there is no need for a full time English teacher at SoJo." #CTU

meta.text: "I am one of the teachers that was dismissed. Apparently there is no need for a full time English teacher at SoJo." #CTU

user.name: ChiTeacherSolidarity
user.description: Chicago Teachers Solidarity Campaign. We stand in support of the Chicago Teachers Union in their fight for quality public education.

quote.text: "This is why we need a union. Without it, #CPS can just fire teachers because they feel like it." #CTU

meta.text: "This is why we need a union. Without it, #CPS can just fire teachers because they feel like it." #CTU

user.name: ChiTeacherSolidarity
user.description: Chicago Teachers Solidarity Campaign. We stand in support of the Chicago Teachers Union in their fight for quality public education.

quote.text: "We know who the puppet-master is behind this. Because we know our students don't need part-time teachers who don't know them." #CTU

meta.text: "We know who the puppet-master is behind this. Because we know our students don't need part-time teachers who don't know them." #CTU

user.name: ChiTeacherSolidarity
user.description: Chicago Teachers Solidarity Campaign. We stand in support of the Chicago Teachers Union in their fight for quality public education.

quote.text: "The reason why I'm here even after being fired is because @CTULocal1 is still fighting for me and my students." #CTU

meta.text: "The reason why I'm here even after being fired is because @CTULocal1 is still fighting for me and my students." #CTU

quote.text: "Students won't take it any more, teachers won't take it any more, we are going to fight!" #CTU

meta.text: "Students won't take it any more, teachers won't take it any more, we are going to fight!" #CTU

user.name: ChiTeacherSolidarity
user.description: Chicago Teachers Solidarity Campaign. We stand in support of the Chicago Teachers Union in their fight for quality public education.

quote.text: Strong standing ovation for Hogan. #ctusolidarity

meta.text: Strong standing ovation for Hogan. #ctusolidarity

quote.text: Now Michael Brunson recording secretary of @CTULocal1 . "We've been in negotiations since november of 2011. We are far apart." #CTU

meta.text: Now Michael Brunson recording secretary of @CTULocal1 . "We've been in negotiations since november of 2011. We are far apart." #CTU

user.name: ChiTeacherSolidarity
user.description: Chicago Teachers Solidarity Campaign. We stand in support of the Chicago Teachers Union in their fight for quality public education.

quote.text: "Many of these empty hands take up guns to make a living." #CTU

meta.text: "Many of these empty hands take up guns to make a living." #CTU

user.name: ChiTeacherSolidarity
user.description: Chicago Teachers Solidarity Campaign. We stand in support of the Chicago Teachers Union in their fight for quality public education.

quote.text: "An injustice anywhere is an injustice everywhere." #CTU

meta.text: "An injustice anywhere is an injustice everywhere." #CTU

user.name: ChiTeacherSolidarity
user.description: Chicago Teachers Solidarity Campaign. We stand in support of the Chicago Teachers Union in their fight for quality public education.

quote.text: "We are here to demand justice, to demand accountability from those who claim to represent us. We want an elected school board!" #CTU

meta.text: "We are here to demand justice, to demand accountability from those who claim to represent us. We want an elected school board!" #CTU

user.name: ChiTeacherSolidarity
user.description: Chicago Teachers Solidarity Campaign. We stand in support of the Chicago Teachers Union in their fight for quality public education.

quote.text: Michael Brunson of #ctu "We ( #Chicago )need an elected School Board" #ctu

meta.text: Michael Brunson of #ctu "We ( #Chicago )need an elected School Board" #ctu

quote.text: "CPS is shutting down workshops, carpentry shops, classes in computer technology. There is a disconnect between CPS and reality." #CTU

meta.text: "CPS is shutting down workshops, carpentry shops, classes in computer technology. There is a disconnect between CPS and reality." #CTU

user.name: ChiTeacherSolidarity
user.description: Chicago Teachers Solidarity Campaign. We stand in support of the Chicago Teachers Union in their fight for quality public education.

quote.text: "We don't just believe, we KNOW another world is possible; a better world is possible right here, right now!" #CTU

meta.text: "We don't just believe, we KNOW another world is possible; a better world is possible right here, right now!" #CTU

user.name: ChiTeacherSolidarity
user.description: Chicago Teachers Solidarity Campaign. We stand in support of the Chicago Teachers Union in their fight for quality public education.

quote.text: "Imagine schools that can keep our children so busy that they have no time for gang activity." #CTU

meta.text: "Imagine schools that can keep our children so busy that they have no time for gang activity." #CTU

user.name: ChiTeacherSolidarity
user.description: Chicago Teachers Solidarity Campaign. We stand in support of the Chicago Teachers Union in their fight for quality public education.

quote.text: "We must hold power accountable. Stop the privatizing!" - #CTU secretary #FairContractNow

meta.text: "We must hold power accountable. Stop the privatizing!" - #CTU secretary #FairContractNow

user.name: Madison Teachers Inc
user.description: We Teach the Children (RTs are not campaign endorsements)

quote.text: "This administration wants to privatize public everything. Public roads, public land, public schools." #CTU

meta.text: "This administration wants to privatize public everything. Public roads, public land, public schools." #CTU

user.name: ChiTeacherSolidarity
user.description: Chicago Teachers Solidarity Campaign. We stand in support of the Chicago Teachers Union in their fight for quality public education.

quote.text: "We, as teachers, need to DEMAND optimal class sizes for our children" - #CTU secretary #FairContractNow

meta.text: "We, as teachers, need to DEMAND optimal class sizes for our children" - #CTU secretary #FairContractNow

user.name: Madison Teachers Inc
user.description: We Teach the Children (RTs are not campaign endorsements)

quote.text: Listening to stories of kindergarten classrooms with 54 kids in a class in CPS. Teachers are fighting for the kids. #solidarity #CTU

meta.text: Listening to stories of kindergarten classrooms with 54 kids in a class in CPS. Teachers are fighting for the kids. #solidarity #CTU

user.name: Bret Hamilton
user.description: A major revolution to be won in the immediate future is the dissipation of man's illusion that his own welfare can be separate from that of all others.

quote.text: "We can not allow them to hijack our #publiced system by imposing a merit pay system." #ctu #FairContractNow

meta.text: "We can not allow them to hijack our #publiced system by imposing a merit pay system." #ctu #FairContractNow
